All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Clojog
Clojog provides simple setup and configuration for structured, colored logging.
ClojogExceptions
Custom exceptions for the clojog library.
ClojogExceptions.InvalidLogLevelException
Exception thrown when an invalid log level is specified.
ClojogExceptions.NotImplementedException
Exception thrown when a feature is not yet implemented.
ClojogExceptions.UnsupportedLogOutputException
Exception thrown when an unsupported log output destination is specified.
ClojogFormatter
Custom encoder for clojog that provides colored output and structured formatting.
ClojogOptions
Configuration options for the clojog logger setup.
DemoApp
Demo application showing clojog usage.
